00022 template< typename Container, typename Criteria>
00023 void erExtractPoints( IplImage *im, Container &pts, Criteria crit)
00024 {  
00025   typedef typename Container::value_type CvPoint;;
00026   int y, x;
00027   for( y = 0; y < im->height; y++)
00028     { 
00029       for( x = 0; x < im->width; x++)
00030         { 
00031           //std::cout << "x =    " << x         << "  " << "y =     " << y       ;//   << std::endl;
00032           CvScalar a = cvGet2D(im,y,x);
00033           //std::cout << "  widht: " << im->width << "  " << "height: " << im->height << std::endl;
00034           if(crit(a.val[0]))
00035             { 
00036               //std::cout << "dentro" << std::endl;
00037               CvPoint p;
00038               p.x = x;
00039               p.y = y;
00040               pts.push_back(p); 
00041 
00042             }
00043         }
00044     }
00045 };

00049 template< typename Container>
00050 void erExtractionCurveUser( IplImage* simag, erCerc* cerc, char** file_name, Container &pts, CvRect recROI)
00051 {
00052   //typedef Container typeContainer;
00053   typedef std::map< double, Container> erMap;
00054   erMap ptsMap;
00055   typename erMap::iterator iterMap;
00056   typename Container::iterator iterV_polyvalent, iterV_pts;
00057   
00058   for( iterV_polyvalent = pts.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != pts.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00059     {
00060       ptsMap[iterV_polyvalent->x].push_back(*iterV_polyvalent);
00061     }
00062   pts.clear();
00063   
00064   //char* new_name = erEcrireNomFicher( file_name, "_curve_");
00065   //std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00066   //if ( myfile.is_open())
00067   // {
00068       std::pair< CvPoint, int> cercle = erCvDebutCurve( simag);
00069       cerc->centro = cercle.first;
00070       cerc->radio = cercle.second;
00071       CvPoint p_polyvalent;
00072       std::vector< int> ptsDmin, ptsY0;
00073       std::vector< int>::iterator iterDmin;
00074       bool Dmin = false;
00075       int a = 0, b = 0, c = 0;
00076       iterMap = ptsMap.begin();
00077       for( iterV_polyvalent = iterMap->second.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != iterMap->second.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00078         {
00079           a = abs( iterV_polyvalent->y - cercle.first.y);
00080           if( a <= cercle.second)
00081             {
00082               if( a < b || Dmin==false)
00083                 {
00084                   c = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00085                   Dmin = true;
00086                   b = a;
00087                 }
00088             }
00089         }
00090       if( Dmin)
00091         {
00092           //iterDmin = std::min_element( ptsDmin.begin(), ptsDmin.end());
00093           p_polyvalent.x = iterMap->first;
00094           p_polyvalent.y = c;
00095           //p_polyvalent.y = abs((*iterDmin) + cercle.first.y);
00096           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00097           //myfile <<  p_polyvalent.x << " " << p_polyvalent.y << std::endl;
00098         }
00099       else
00100         {
00101           std::string name = INFOFILE;
00102           name+= "_imagesOUT.txt";
00103           const char* nomb = name.c_str();
00104           std::ofstream file( nomb, std::ios_base::app );
00105           file << file_name[2] << std::endl;
00106           file << std::endl;
00107           pts.clear();
00108           return; 
00109         }
00110       int A=0;
00111       iterMap++;
00112       for( ; iterMap != ptsMap.end(); iterMap++)
00113         { 
00114           CvPoint cpt = pts.back();
00115           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y));
00116           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00117             { 
00118               iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00119               if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00120                 {
00121                   iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00122                   if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00123                     {
00124                       iterMap--;
00125                       iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00126                       if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==-1)
00127                         {
00128                           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00129                           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==1)
00130                             {
00131                               std::string name = INFOFILE;
00132                               name+= "_imagesOUT.txt";
00133                               const char* nomb = name.c_str();
00134                               std::ofstream file( nomb, std::ios_base::app );
00135                               file << file_name[2] << std::endl;
00136                               file << std::endl;
00137                               pts.clear();

00145                               //myfile <<  p_polyvalent.x << " " <<  p_polyvalent.y << std::endl;
00146                               A=-1;
00147                             }
00148                         }

00164                       A=0;
00165                     }
00166                 }
00167               else
00168                 {
00169                   p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;

00340 
00341 template< typename Container>
00342 void erConvertPixelToMks( std::pair< double, double> factor, Container &pts, char** file_name)
00343 {
00344   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00345   std::string name( file_name[2]);
00346   size_t ext_pos = name.find_last_of( '_' );
00347   size_t ext_pos1 = name.find_last_of( '.');
00348   if( ext_pos != std::string::npos && ext_pos1 != std::string::npos )
00349     {
00350       
00351       std::string ext2 = name.substr( ext_pos + 1);
00352       std::string name2 = ext2.substr( 0,  ext_pos1 - (ext_pos + 1));
00353       int num = boost::lexical_cast<int>( name2);
00354       std::string name3 = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(num);
00355       while(name2.size()>name3.size())
00356         {
00357           name3.insert( 0, "0" );
00358         }
00359       std::string name4( file_name[1]);
00360       name4+= "_data_";
00361       name4+= name3;
00362       name4+= ".txt";
00363       char* new_name = new char[ name4.size() + 1];
00364       std::copy( name4.begin(), name4.end(), new_name);
00365       new_name[ name4.size()] = '\0';
00366       
00367       //Ouverture du ficher
00368       std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00369       if (myfile.is_open())
00370         {
00371           //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00372           typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00373           Iterator deb=pts.begin();
00374           Iterator fin=pts.end();
00375           
00376           for(;deb!=fin;deb++)
00377             {
00378               //std::cout << deb->x*factor.first << std::endl;
00379               myfile << deb->x*factor.first << "  " << deb->y*factor.second << std::endl;
00380             }     
00381           myfile.close();
00382         }
00383       else 
00384         {
00385           std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00386         }
00387     }
00388   else
00389     {
00390       std::cout << "error in format input file images";
00391     } 
00392 };

00397 template< typename Container>
00398 void erEcriturePointPixel( Container &pts, char** file_name)
00399 {
00400   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00401   char* new_name = erEcrireNomFicher( file_name, "_curve_");
00402 
00403   //Ouverture du ficher
00404   std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00405   if (myfile.is_open())
00406     {
00407       //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00408       typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00409       Iterator deb=pts.begin();
00410       Iterator fin=pts.end();
00411       
00412       for(;deb!=fin;deb++)
00413         {
00414           //std::cout << deb->x*factor.first << std::endl;
00415           myfile << deb->x << "  " << deb->y << std::endl;
00416         }         
00417       myfile.close();
00418     }
00419   else 
00420     {
00421       std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00422     }
00423 };

00426 
00427 template< typename Iterator>
00428 Iterator erFindCvPoint( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CvPoint punto)
00429 {
00430   while(p1 != p2)
00431     {
00432       if( p1->y == punto.y)
00433         {
00434           return p1;
00435           break;
00436         }
00437       p1++;
00438     }
00439   return p2;
00440 };
